title: AI & Machine Learning Basics
author: Tech Education Series
description: An introduction to artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts

data.title: What is Artificial Intelligence?
data.content: AI is the simulation of human intelligence in machines programmed to think and learn.

data.title: Types of Machine Learning
data.content: Machine learning can be categorized into three main types based on how algorithms learn.
bullets: Supervised Learning - learns from labeled data
Unsupervised Learning - finds patterns in unlabeled data
Reinforcement Learning - learns through trial and error

data.question: Which type of machine learning uses labeled training data?
data.answer: Supervised Learning uses labeled training data where the algorithm learns from input-output pairs to make predictions on new data.

data.caption: Machine learning algorithms can identify complex patterns in data

data.code:
# Simple machine learning example with scikit-learn
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
import numpy as np

# Generate sample data
X = np.random.randn(100, 1)
y = 2 * X.squeeze() + 1 + np.random.randn(100) * 0.1

# Split data into training and testing sets
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.2)

# Create and train the model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# Make predictions
predictions = model.predict(X_test)
print(f'Model score: {model.score(X_test, y_test):.3f}')
data.caption: A simple linear regression example using Python and scikit-learn
